page.title: 13LULWORTH CARNIVAL 1985 (2)
page.content: West Lulworth First School won First Prize in the Children's Section,with a float entitled'Wild West Lulworth'.It was a Covered Wagon,with the children dressed as Cowboys and Indians.First Prize in the Adult Section went to the Castle Inn, with their float 'George and the Dragon'. Other floats included;'Nursery Rhymes','Peter Pan','Pirates',Arabian Nights'and'75 Years of Guiding'. LULWORTH CARNIVAL was an undoubted success,with all the village joining in to make it a happy occasion.Mention must also be made of the considerable help given during the event,by a Troop from Lulworth Camp.(By kind permission of Col.R J Martin). The Carnival raised Â£656 for 3 local organisations.
